title: How to Become an Adventurer As a Kid or Teen

steps.headline: First, you need is to prepare.
steps.description: Have a good survival course[if possible]. Watch discovery for adventure shows and read lots of books[fiction and non fiction] about adventures Search on Google for more information. Watch videos on youtube related to survival. Try to read biographies of famous explorers and adventurers. Try to prepare yourself in every way you can. Or have an adult to help you.

steps.headline: Buy a cheap backpack.
steps.description:
It should not be expensive. The items must vary from environment to environment. Some items in your bag must be:-
A water bottle
Enough food for 2-3 days
Clothes (depending on the environment)
Ropes
Harness (for climbing)
Fishing hooks (near the coast)
A knife

steps.headline: Learn some survival skills.
steps.description:
Some of them are mentioned down:-
Fire skills:- Learn to burn fire using the bow drill method. Learn to burn fire using steel wood and battery. Learn to burn fire with lens or a magnifier

steps.headline: Finding water:- If you are on a mountain, go downhill.
steps.description: You might get rivers or streams.

steps.headline: Finding food:- If you are near the coast, search for fish or crabs.
Shelter:-Learn to make shelter using leaves and sticks
Signalling:- A signal mirror would be best.
steps.description: A whistle would work good but yelling won't. Try to put a flag on a top surface for signal. Even fire is good for signalling.

steps.headline: Be adventurous.
steps.description: Go to hiking with your friends. Have a walk in the nature. Try new things and etc.

steps.headline: Read books about animals, birds, environment and plants.
steps.description: These can benefit you in different ways.

Try to read biographies of famous explorers and adventurers. Try to prepare yourself in every way you can. Or have an adult to help you. Buy a cheap backpack. It should not be expensive. The items must vary from environment to environment. Some items in your bag must be:-
A water bottle

Fire skills:- Learn to burn fire using the bow drill method. Learn to burn fire using steel wood and battery. Learn to burn fire with lens or a magnifier Finding water:- If you are on a mountain, go downhill. You might get rivers or streams. Finding food:- If you are near the coast, search for fish or crabs. Know how to hunt animals. Shelter:-Learn to make shelter using leaves and sticks  Signalling:- A signal mirror would be best. A whistle would work good but yelling won't. Try to put a flag on a top surface for signal. Even fire is good for signalling. Be adventurous. Go to hiking with your friends. Have a walk in the nature. Try new things and etc. Read books about animals, birds, environment and plants. These can benefit you in different ways. Have fun.
